entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 10:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
